name: RubySinatra
description:
Vim support for syntax highlight and snippets that helper coding
applications based in Ruby/Sinatra micro-framework.

The snippets are written with base the SnipMate #2540 plugin.

You maybe contributes to source. So, send a feedback in issue tracker (http://github.com/hallison/vim-ruby-sinatra/issues).

Vim-Ruby/Sinatra is hosted on following servers:

-- Github (http://github.com/hallison/vim-ruby-sinatra)
-- Codaset (http://codaset.com/hallison/vim-ruby-sinatra/issues)

Copyright (C) 2010 Hallison Batista <email@hallisonbatista.com>
install_details:
Download the gzipball and open the package using Vim. Use the command `:source %`. Or run the following command:

$ vim ruby-sinatra-<version>.vba.gz +":source %"

Done! All files will be extracted in your Vim home directory.

versions.release_notes:
* Updates in tasks to make the manifest file.
* Removed unnecessary files.
* Small improvements.
* Fixes in the syntax detection.
